ModMetaData.name: Area Rugs 1.0 [LWM]
ModMetaData.author: LWM, Fisty, and Darc
ModMetaData.description:
This mod adds to RimWorld: ---------------- 1 Door mat (rotate to align correctly with doorway) (no functionality beyond being pretty) 7 Circle rugs (1x1 to 7x7 tiles) 7 Square rugs (1x1 to 7x7 tiles) 6 Hall runners (1x2 to 1x7 tiles) 9 Rectangle rugs (2x3 to 6x8 tiles) 25 New cloth colors ----------------
Credit: All graphics and some XML coding by AElflaed (Fisty), extra XML coding and testing by Darc Clan. All C# and some XML by LWM.
Permissions: Based off the B19 version (https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=934235098) by Fisty and Darc. This page: https://www.nexusmods.com/rimworld/mods/112/? seems to grant permission to modify the mod? If I am in any error, please forgive, and I will remove this version. (I have tagged this version [LWM] so "Area Rugs 1.0" is still available)
